column1: Unsafe shell command constructed from library input
column2: Using externally controlled strings in a command line may allow a malicious user to change the meaning of the command.
column4: [["String concatenation"|"relative:///src/linux-current-connections.js:9:5:9:48"]] based on library input is later used in [["shell command"|"relative:///src/linux-current-connections.js:12:3:50:4"]].
